name: Bizzare Bazaar
description:
A text adventure about getting scammed and getting revenge.

Made for Scam Jam.

Credits
  • Bread - Programming, ASCII ART
  • BgAlex - Writing, Game Design/Concept
  • Tiffany - ASCII ART
  • Lemmy - Music
Diversifiers used
  • Disunity - make your game in something other than Unity
  • Chunky Cheese
  • Jack's lantern - include a carved pumpkin in your game
  • Trans Rights - make your game say trans rights
  • Organizer Andy - Write a cohesive design document
  • Reference in some shape or form, "Chunkie Cheese"
  • add chunky cheese (how? that's your problem.)
